about_the_game:
Embark on a festive journey with this delightful DLC, where interior design meets puzzle-solving in a Christmas-themed adventure. Help Ryan transform his living room into a winter wonderland, as you navigate through captivating blast puzzles to unlock a plethora of enchanting decorations.

From twinkling lights to festive ornaments, each level brings new elements to add to your holiday canvas.

Whether you're a fan of the classic red and green Christmas palette or prefer a more contemporary approach, the game caters to all tastes. As you progress, watch Ryan's living room evolve into a cozy, festive space, filled with the joy and warmth of the holiday season.
detailed_description:
Embark on a festive journey with this delightful DLC, where interior design meets puzzle-solving in a Christmas-themed adventure. Help Ryan transform his living room into a winter wonderland, as you navigate through captivating blast puzzles to unlock a plethora of enchanting decorations.

From twinkling lights to festive ornaments, each level brings new elements to add to your holiday canvas.

Whether you're a fan of the classic red and green Christmas palette or prefer a more contemporary approach, the game caters to all tastes. As you progress, watch Ryan's living room evolve into a cozy, festive space, filled with the joy and warmth of the holiday season.

short_description: Join Ryan in a festive adventure as you help him decorate his living room for Christmas! Match colorful puzzles in a fun blast game, earning unique decorations to create a holiday masterpiece. Embrace the Christmas spirit in this cozy makeover challenge!
